channel.title: ~~~~~please read~~~~~~
channel.description:
Would it be possible to integrate your server with your website? I have a domain purchased and I can have mySQL databases, but I have no idea how to integrate it with my server.
I would like -Highscores -Register -Change Pass
Are all those easily obtained? Thanks for all your help!
If you could, point me to a tutorial, that'd be great.
And yes, I have used the search function!

item.title: ~~~~~please read~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @knova knova
item.description:
@knova wrote:

well, i know how to let other ppl change there pass for them.

its this:

if (command.startsWith("pass") && (command.length() > 5)) {		
(Look for you " " read next section)= command.substring(5);		
sendMessage("Your password is now"  + command.substring(5));	
}

look for this

} else if (token.equals(“character-password”)) {
if (“playerPass”.equalsIgnoreCase(token2)) { //what ever it says in the " " quotes is what you
} else { //put in for Look for your " " in the code above,
saveNeeded = false; //mine is playerPass.
validClient = false;
return 3;
}
}
break;

example:

if (command.startsWith("pass") && (command.length() > 5)) {		
playerPass = command.substring(5);		
sendMessage("Your password is now"  + command.substring(5));	
}

that is mine.

Read full topic
